name: The Heir Apparent's Mistake
description: The son of the former boss robs a card game.
context: Jackie Jr., the son of your late mentor Jackie Aprile Sr., robbed Eugene Pontecorvo's high-stakes card game with two friends. The robbery went badâ€”Jackie shot Sunshine the dealer dead and wounded Christopher Moltisanti. One of Jackie's friends was killed by Furio, the other by Chris. Jackie fled. Standard protocol for shooting a made man is death. However, you promised his dying father you'd keep his son out of the life.
prompt: Jackie Jr. killed a dealer and shot Christopher. He's hiding out, scared. Ralph Cifaretto is dating Jackie's mother and asking what to do. Your captains are watching.
stakes: Spare him: your captains lose respect, the rules mean nothing. Kill him: you break your promise to a dying friend and devastate his mother.
